High Priest Orven:

Thank you for answering my plea.

Go to the War-Torn Plains and defeat the monsters roaming there. Monsters to hunt: Graveyard Wanderer, Archer of Greed, Hatar Ratman Thief, Hatar Ratman Boss, Hatar Hanishee, Deprive, Taik Orc Elder, Violent Farcran. You have to kill 700 monsters.
